website_summaries.verdict: If you want to give a self-stirring mug a try, this one has room for large drinks and comes at a decent price point.
pros: Has a low price for such a large mug with the self-stirring feature, as it can hold up to 16 ounces
Comes in choice of 4 colors – black, gray, red, dark blue, light blue
cons: A few mugs arrived with scratches in inscription

customer_reviews.title: Novelty item
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these as a novelty. They work fine, but the cheap plastic is not nice at all to drink out of. Buy them for fun - just don't plan on really using it much.
customer_reviews.author: jhimmel

customer_reviews.title: Works good and my son loves it for hot cocoa
customer_reviews.text: My son liked it for hot cocoa or chocolate milk. You have to be really careful when washing because the base doesn’t have a good watertight seal.
customer_reviews.author: CJsmom

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality.
customer_reviews.text: I’m trying to figure out how to return this. I gave it to my mom for Christmas and she poured and hot cocoa and immediately just started pouring through the bottom of the cup. It’s faulty. I ordered the black one as well which ended up being just fine. But the blue one was made bad
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Rovenstine

customer_reviews.title: It mixes well
customer_reviews.text: You need to be careful not to let water get into the battery compartment at the bottom of the cup when washing. The battery holder is poorly built, at times I have to open the compartment, and reposition the batteries for it to work .
customer_reviews.author: sanjay ramkissoon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bulletproof coffee and gifts
customer_reviews.text: This cup is perfect for bulletproof coffee. No more cleaning up a blender and cup. Easy and fun. The stainless steel cup is much better than the plastic. I purchased 2 plastic cups before this one that broke (both of them). The only negative is that you can’t put in dishwasher or submerge in water so it isn’t the easiest to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sims

customer_reviews.title: Mug Self-stirring
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these. Keeps the coffee, chocolate, etc, stirred. Just make sure you don't get water at the bottom of mug, as if it gets in, it's good bye motor. Otherwise, it should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: RAMZ711

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the office but that may be it
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted a mug like this.I used it about 3 times and today I realized the lid barely has any traction to keep it on.Its got a thin piece of rubber I can pull off.I think this is a great buy for the office,as it sits on my desk and I can stir it when my drink settles. Which is what I originally bought it for but I will say its kind of a delicate mug.The bottom twists off to put the batteries so you can't wash it or microwave it like a normal mug.Hand wash only and very carefully.Not bad for the price but you also get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: P.H

customer_reviews.title: Self Stirring Junk
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for my kids. One didn’t work at all and the other one let off this shriek like nails on a chalkboard. Save your money folks.
customer_reviews.author: robmcgwrites

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of junk. The lid doesn't seal. So, if you too if up to finish a Sri k, it spills all o Dr you. The batteries lasted only a couple of dags. After less than 3 weeks it the stirred stopped working g completely. This is the worst thing I've ever purchased in Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Ehren

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. Father in law loves it & shows it off.
customer_reviews.author: Sinderella

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my bulletproof coffee.. it did the job.. I mistakenly let my son wash dishes and this was under water and was ruined after that.. great buy .. blends well.
customer_reviews.author: Shamicka white

customer_reviews.title: JUNK.. don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: worked without water, put water in and it doesn't work. Kept trying and it is hit and miss maybe every 10-12 time it will come on but shuts off before it mixes. Very disappointed, junk product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product
customer_reviews.text: If I had not used it already, I would send it back. It worked for one use and then stopped. Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shirlean

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give minus stars, I would! Stopped working after only two uses.
customer_reviews.author: Fun Gram

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is so cool and great for tea and coffee
customer_reviews.author: Danyell williams

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The cup is rusty I bough .doesn't stir properly.also where th e button to push very hair to work it nonthing lie advertised I would like to return it please I have the box it came in need a return packing slip .ty
customer_reviews.author: regina timpson

customer_reviews.title: Does not work all the time
customer_reviews.text: Does not work constantly. Sometime it will work and sometimes it will not. Very irritating. Took it apart and there was liquid inside the motor area from my drink and one of the wires was no longer attached.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph K. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great for a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: The kids loved it for about a week, motor dies quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew and Dani

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 for Christmas presents. After 2 months both stopped working. Both were only used once or twice a week for Keurig type hot chocolate. Very disappointing and the window to return was 1 month.
customer_reviews.author: rennie conyers

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun. Died a month later
customer_reviews.text: Liked the concept and enjoyed it when it worked. Poor quality. This product has a short life. Thats too bad, I liked it but can't afford to buy another one every month.
customer_reviews.author: James Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: It Showed Up Like This!
customer_reviews.text: Nice mug, but it arrived with the letters severely scratched. I’m hoping that it is a brand new cup! Have not have the opportunity to use it yet, but I have installed the batteries and ran the mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: Sharif A. Na'eem

customer_reviews.title: just for fun
customer_reviews.text: its not that you really need one but geez its cool to have
customer_reviews.author: Carolann Freuler

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: It has stopped working. I put new batteries in it
customer_reviews.author: Neferti-ti  Owona

customer_reviews.title: Remember it uses batteries and do not submerge in water.
customer_reviews.text: This is great. No more coffee grinds at the bottom of my cup and it's great for hot chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mug!!!
customer_reviews.text: This a great mug. The only thing is the top is not very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: They don't stir always!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 cups like that and each one I had trouble with the stirring on the cups!...They didn't work!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: keep eye an wear out batterys
customer_reviews.text: I LIKED EVERY THING ABOUT IT BESIDES I ORDERED FEW MORE FOR FRIENDS & FAMILY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nothing
customer_reviews.text: it only last two days and the motor stop working and it was not worth sending back
customer_reviews.author: robert chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: This is a good value so far. I'm drinking my first mug of coffee. I have a stirring mug with a magnetic pellet, but the problem there is I've lost 2 different pellets so I decided to try this one. Observations: Produced a frothier result, makes less noise, cost less, but holds a little less coffee. The only open question is durability but at least I don't have to worry about losing another pellet!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the idea of a self-stirring cup
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 3 or more of these, each time hoping it would work better. It breaks within 2-3 weeks. In one case the battery connection was finicky, so I had to end up using duck tape. Another time something inside the cup broke and I could hear it moving around. And the third time I have no idea what happened, but it just stoped working.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes they work, and sometimes they don't!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several of these mugs, some work, and some don't! The ones that DO work, save using a spoon to stir my coffee in the morning! Then save wiping the counter where the spoon was laid! Im lazy, I will admit it, but, I LOVE these mugs!
customer_reviews.author: granny

customer_reviews.title: Works great to make chocolate milk
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson and he loves it! He uses it to make chocolate milk. It’s been dropped several times and holds up well. It can not be immersed in water though, because of the batteries, and the screw on cover is not water tight. Otherwise it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Barth

customer_reviews.title: You will never have to stir your beverage again😊
customer_reviews.text: I have this bought from another source, I enjoy my self stirring mug very much! I bought these for my sisters as a Mother's Day gift! We enjoy drinking coffee together these mugs are gonna make it even better!
customer_reviews.author: Geneva Smith

customer_reviews.title: Self stir coffee cup
customer_reviews.text: This cup was given to me the first time and lasted more than six months finally died I ordered another it died much earlier I ordered another steel died much sooner I would not order this product again ever again
customer_reviews.author: Linda S. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Love It But Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this Cup and it’s wotks wonders. This is my second purchase of this same cup. My first cup broke in the second month. My second cup within the second month again! I really hate not liking this cup because it works great but I can’t keep wasting my money!
customer_reviews.author: A. Woods

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Using it right now mixes well don’t submerge in water and you’ll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dj

customer_reviews.title: Great on the go or at home!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great to go cup! It keeps the beverages hot all the way to work. I like not having to use a spoon to stir with LOL
customer_reviews.author: Texas Mom

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to write home about
customer_reviews.text: When you press the button sometimes it works. The spinner inside gets stuck and you have to turn it by hand to get it to move.. It is tight on the spindle. Make sure it is free spinning before you add your coffee/mix. It can be a pain.
customer_reviews.author: P. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Pefect dad gift!
customer_reviews.text: Pperfect! Its super fun and entertaining lol. It says not dishwasher safe, but we've washed ours and still works. Great gift! Love it! Very durable and no leaks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: It was great when i first got the product but after 2-1/2 months, it no longer works even though I put in fresh batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Koyama

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this cup she uses it when she makes her tea
customer_reviews.author: Lenard  Mauck

customer_reviews.title: Used before they left they party
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift in an exchange. They used it before they left the party
customer_reviews.author: Mrkoehler

customer_reviews.title: Self stirring Mug Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it. I like because no more coffee spoons lying on the counter in the em!!
customer_reviews.author: marcia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the spinner gives a good effect for French Market chickory coffee
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like it’s supposed to!
customer_reviews.text: Great for bulletproof coffees. Makes any separation easy to stir up again.
customer_reviews.author: Soli

product_meta.title: Stainless Steel Coffee Mug Self Stiring Mugs Electric Automatic Mixing Cups for Stir Coffee Milk Mix Juice Drink and Plastic 300ml 12-16 OZ (Dark Blue)
product_meta.description:
Color:Dark BlueAre you too busy to make coffee every morning? Or simply too lazy? 
Well, good news! Now we created a mug that can smoothly stir your drink by itself. No spoon, no mess. 
Either it's lazy Sunday or busy Monday, this self-stirring mug is a perfect on the go companion. Even better, just need to wait 1 minute, the stirring technology will produce wonderful frothing on your coffee combination. 
And of course this mug is great for any beverage, such as aromatic tea or smooth hot cocoa!! Please enjoy your free time. it's really a perfect gifts for your family, friends and co-workers. 
We put the switch button exactly at the top of the hold, so it’s easy to turn on and reach by your thumb. 
Moreover, it has black color with smooth texture and metal outer ring for absolute modern look and catchy writing on the front. 
Most important, it comes with airtight lid to prevent the contents from spilling and also to preserve the temperature of your drink. 
Plus, the premium food grade stainless steel construction will not easily break or dented by simple collision! 

Related Search: 
Self stir mugs, stir mugs, mugs, electronic mugs, electric mugs, stainless steel mugs, self stirring mugs, mugs
for coffee lover, coffee, tea, drink, coffee gifts, stainless steel coffee mugs, coffee travel mug stainless steel. 

Product details:
Color: Black, Red, Yellow, Green, Light Blue, Dark Blue 
Capacity: 12-16 oz 
Dimension: 3.46x 4.65 inch 
Material: Stainless steel and plastic
feature_bullets: ENJOY A BETTER LIFE :This self-stirring mug is simply what you need for trave .Just one push, it will simply stir the content smoothly by itself. Enjoy your morning coffee milk tea juice drink cocoa chocolate oats and while driving, without worry of spilling and making a mess. Powered by 2 AAA batteries with perfect stirring speed mechanism: not too slow and not too fast.It can provide you more perfect for your self-timer that can show on facebook .

SUPER DURABLE STAINLESS STEEL AND AIRTIGHT SEAL: Imagine that you are doing bussiness with a mug full of hot coffee in your hand. Sounds like a surprise waiting to happen. The cup's lid has a hole allows you to use a straw to sip coffee and others. When the mixing function is turning on, keep the lid closed and the solid cover can reduce any spillage.Moreover,the high grade silicone seal will secure your mug tightly to preserve the heat and coldness of your drink about 3 hours.

BIGGER CAPACITY THAN ANY OTHER MUG :We know how much you need your coffee intake, the more the better, right? That’s why our self-stirring mug has bigger capacity to quench your thirst. It can holds 12-16 oz of your drink, almost a half bigger than any other mug. More is always better.

SWITCH BUTTON AND AUTOMATIC MIXING:We put the switch button exactly at the top of the hold, so it’s easy to turn on and reach by your thumb. The handle itself is firm and comfy to grip.One key waterproof switch operation is simple,can effectively prevent the liquid into the switch.

WARM TIPS: Self Mixing Cups requires 2 AAA batteries(Not include), please ensure that the battery is installed after the bottom cover is sealed. NOT dishwasher safe; DO NOT microwave;Hand wash ONLY,DO NOT wash in the water to prevent the use of water after the impact. Please wash it after drinking immediately .
